1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

1.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - 150 men show up for the audition, who will make it through the first cut which takes us down to 25 guys? Who fills out their underwear best?

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

2.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - We meet the first of the guys who make it to the final 12 and the boys learn a dance routine for the Snow-Ball at Whistler.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

3.plot: We meet more of the final 12 and hang out with them backstage in Whistler for the Snow-Ball. Chad comes out.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

4.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - We meet the last of our 12 finalists. Pearson and Tyrone start dating and Jason Haddock coaches the guys for their first photo-shoot.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

5.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - Jason Haddock critiques the boys efforts and at Score they meet the press and public. The show ends with an underwear shoot for Aussie Bum.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

6.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - the guys strip down to their underwear for a video shoot on the beach. It's winter in Vancouver so the half naked boys draw quite a crowd.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

7.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - Rehearsals for the Grand Finale have a bumpy start but they also experience charity work with Friends For Life. Pearson and Tyrone split.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

8.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - The Grand Finale begins and the line-up goes around the block. The judges are impressed as the guys take to the catwalk in their underwear.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: How Far Will You Go? (TV Series 2008–2009)

9.plot: We follow 12 hot gay guys as they battle it out for the title of 'Vancouver's Gay Next Top Model' - We've followed the guys through the highs and lows as they have learned how to be a Top Model but who will be the overall winner?

imdb.plot outline: Follows a group of aspiring gay models and their ambitious talent agents as they claw their way through hard work and heartbreak towards careers in gay modeling. Shot behind the scenes at a male modeling competition in Vancouver BC, How Far Will You Go is a real look into the stories and lives of the people involved.
imdb.title: How Far Will You Go?
plot: Follows a group of aspiring gay models and their ambitious talent agents as they claw their way through hard work and heartbreak towards careers in gay modeling. Shot behind the scenes at a male modeling competition in Vancouver BC, How Far Will You Go is a real look into the stories and lives of the people involved.::Samantha Sowassey
